thread.title: Zendaya’s latest look is making us want to take a tropical vacation — here’s how to copy her style
thread.title_full: Zendaya’s latest look is making us want to take a tropical vacation — here’s how to copy her style

author: Amanda Grace
title: Zendaya’s latest look is making us want to take a tropical vacation — here’s how to copy her style
text:
Zendaya’s latest look is making us want to take a tropical vacation — here’s how to copy her style Booking our next tropical vacay thanks to Zendaya! She attended Dolce & Gabbana’s Millennial Cocktail Hour at their Rodeo Drive store in Beverly Hills, and her outfit has us SCREAMING. The sheer black bustier paired with a full skirt is the perfect transition into spring. We love the juxtaposed combo so much that we can’t wait to copy this look for ourselves!
In addition to an amazing ensemble, Zendaya also rocked beachy waves and orange lipstick. This is the same look we were dying over earlier in the week with Khloé Kardashian , proving the tropical vacay look is here to stay! Grab your beach hair texturizing spray, orange lipstick, and some of these pieces to complete Zendaya’s flirty look. Then, have your own cocktail party, because why not?
This whole outfit is spring perfection! D&G 
A post shared by Zendaya (@zendaya) on Mar 23, 2017 at 7:08pm PDT 
We are DEFINITELY feeling the bustier trend for spring and summer! Charming Zendaya wearing #DGTropicoItaliano at #DGNewVision cocktail party. #DGMillennials 
A post shared by Dolce & Gabbana (@dolcegabbana) on Mar 23, 2017 at 9:47pm PDT 
While Zendaya’s designer look would definitely max our credit cards, copying the bold outfit doesn’t have to! Bauer-Griffin / Getty Images Here is how you can recreate the risque combo for yourself!
Strappy Boned Bustier , $12.99 Amazon Caress Too Lace Buster , $58 Nordstrom Stripe it Lucky Skater Skirt , $44.99 MODCLOTH Striped Full Skirt , $37.00 ASOS Gold Coin Plated Earrings, $36 SusVintage / Etsy Gold Coin Earrings , $19.99 Bonanza Zendaya in her Dolce & Gabbana cocktail party outfit definitely makes us think of a tropical vacay! Throw on some black pumps and orange lipstick, and you’re good to go.
